alert.note: Alert for Northern Campbell; Southern Campbell; Western Crook (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued November 02 at 5:06AM MDT until November 02 at 3:00PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 PM MDT THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Southwest winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 60 mph. * WHERE...Northern Campbell County, Southern Campbell County and Western Crook County. * WHEN...Until 3 PM MDT this afternoon. * IMPACTS...The high winds may damage roofs, small outbuildings, and signs. Power outages are possible. Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Strong winds can cause blowing dust, reduced visibility, and flying debris.
info.instruction: Persons outdoors should watch for flying or falling objects that may injure you. If you are driving, be prepared for sudden wind gusts that can cause you to lose control of your vehicle, especially on open stretches, or as you approach the crest of hills. Also be alert for debris or dust blowing across the road.

area.areaDesc: Northern Campbell; Southern Campbell; Western Crook
